title: is it the new patch making my frame rate bad?
body: hey there, just wondering why i cant see my spells go og an when i can they cast 3 secs after i use them (the animation) but it goes of instantly my computer is specs far exceedes whats needed for lol, ive played over 400 days game time and never had this issue, also was on last night, my ping doiesnt go up neather does my fps ? any suggestions

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

hey man yea i did all that its fine last game but it happend again after i did all the troubleshooting
it only started today when i uploaded the patch

Try the fixes here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs

Could also be connection related: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
and sorry to be an absolute prik but i have no idea where to screen shot the stats for my comp hahaha {{summoner:14}}

There's no easy way to see everything that would be relevant, and I'd only know for Windows so hopefully that's what you're running. I guess the two places with pertinent info would be:

1. My Computer/This PC (depending on windows version) > Right click in an empty space in the folder > Properties > Note your Processor and amount of RAM.

2. Your graphics card, if you're running an nvidia card, Right Click on the Desktop > Nvidia Control Panel > System Information (bottom left of the panel) > Note what graphics card you have under Items. If you have an AMD card I'd have no idea how to find that information.

I don't need compensation for anything, I do this just because I like to :) I'm also not a tech person, just grew up arounnd computers so my knowledge is fairly limited. I will say though that as far as games go League is pretty low spec compatible. You don't even need all that beefy of a machine to run everything on ultra. 

Good with PCs is relative to what you actually want to do with them. My PC is far above average for gaming, but there are other things my PC wouldn't be considered good enough for. I've honestly struggled more with asking too much of my PC and Photoshop than I have with any game :P
how do i put the pictiures in here

You can screenshot with snipping tool (just hit Start and type in snipping tool and it'll come up it's windows standard) then copy that image onto a site like imgur (https://imgur.com/).

You don't need screenshots though if you just wanna write down what it says. Whatever you think is easiest.
ok so it says intel pentium cpu g3258@ 3.20gz installed me mory 12gb and graphics card is a gtx 960

Pretty decent. 960 is solid, don't know much about the CPU but sounds fairly average, RAM is spicy amount wise but depends on speed (much harder to find out, really only relevant to load times tho). Certainly should be able to run majority of games on reasonably high settings.

Not the kind of PC you'd expect to be affected by the frame skipping issue, dId you have any luck fixing it?
no mate now a little error posp up inte corner saying kernal patch error then some numbers i had a power supply issue but i got it fixed at pbtec it seems to have only just happened since the patch

I'd recommend speaking to Player Support in that case, I'm not too sure what else to tell you.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

legend mate im trying these steps now. could i please ask one favour could u tell me if my pc is good enough i mean at the end of a day im a blocklayer and dont knw anything about comps, if i screen shot could u have a look and il buy u a skin or something
